overview: Three for the price of one, how about that! First up, “Bikey Mike” the bike-riding pupper takes to the stage as he is whirled around performing dazzling stunts. “Fannie and Her Fan” is up next, a fan dancer who uses elaborate feather fans as she disrobes! Last in this party of puppetry is “Sir Rollin D. Bones," the dancing skeleton puppet, who's got some moves you may find...humerus!
title: Three-In-One Revue
